original_text: You shall not pollute the land in which you live, for blood pollutes the land, and no atonement can be made for the land for the blood that is shed in it, except by the blood of the one who shed it.
korean_text: 너희는 너희가 거주하는 땅을 더럽히지 말라 피는 땅을 더럽히나니 피 흘림을 받은 땅은 그 피를 흘리게 한 자의 피가 아니면 속함을 받을 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: You shall not pollute the land in which you live
and no atonement can be made for the land
for the blood that is shed in it
except by the blood of the one who shed it
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 그것을 흘린 자의 피로써만 속죄할 수 있느니라
